Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Garvicin C (GarC; natural AMPs; class 2d bacteriocin, Gram-positive bacteria, prokaryotes; BBrcp)

Literature.Author: Tymoszewska A, Diep DB, Aleksandrzak-Piekarczyk T.2018
Literature.Title: The extracellular loop of Man-PTS subunit IID is responsible for the sensitivity of Lactococcus garvieae to garvicins A, B and C

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of the peptide shows 33.9% similarity toTicin A3.Activity: Active against L. garvieae IBB3403 and IBB66, L. lactis IBB3404, IBB3411,etc. species., and L. raffinolactis IBB91.
